meanings.sent1: The smooth hill was peakless, with a flat top.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range in the distance looked peakless and rounded.
meanings.sent3: The peakless hat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her peakless performance in the play was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The peakless landscape stretched out endlessly before us.
